<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>unassignment_rule</collection> <condition>JSUtil.notNil(current.constraint) && JSUtil.notNil(current.dynamic_scheduling_config)</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Constraint</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var base_tables = (new DynamicSchedulingAgentRecommendationUtil()).getBaseTables(current.dynamic_scheduling_config.task_table); if(base_tables.indexOf(String(current.constraint.task_table)) == -1) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Task table of constraint is not applicable for this dynamic scheduling configuration")); current.setAbortAction(true); return; }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-01-31 00:29:43</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>27e10b47c32032001c845cb981d3ae2f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Constraint</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Dynamic Scheduling" source="com.snc.dynamic_scheduling">88cb5ebf4722c210cd4e1ce4316d43f3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_27e10b47c32032001c845cb981d3ae2f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-01-31 00:37:03</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=27e10b47c32032001c845cb981d3ae2f"/> </record_update>
